title: Architecture Decision: Riverpod over BLoC
content:
After evaluating BLoC, Riverpod, and GetX, we chose Riverpod 2.x for state management. Key reasons:

1. Compile-time safety with code generation
2. Better testability with ProviderContainer
3. No BuildContext dependency for accessing providers
4. Autodispose for memory management
5. Family modifier for parameterized providers

Trade-offs: Steeper learning curve, code generation step required.

title: Moon Design Integration Notes
content:
Moon Design uses MaterialApp as base with ThemeExtension.

Setup:
- MoonTheme with MoonTokens.light / MoonTokens.dark
- Access colors: context.moonColors!.piccolo
- Access typography: context.moonTypography!.heading.text24
- Squircle borders by default

No built-in NavigationBar. Use Material BottomNavigationBar.

Key widgets: MoonFilledButton, MoonTextInput, MoonTabBar, MoonAlert, MoonAccordion, MoonMenuItem.

title: GGML Quantization Methods Comparison
content:
Tested on Gemma 2B:
- Q4_0: 1.5 GB, ~25 tok/s, quality drop noticeable
- Q4_K_M: 1.6 GB, ~23 tok/s, good quality/size balance
- Q5_K_M: 1.8 GB, ~20 tok/s, minimal quality loss
- Q8_0: 2.7 GB, ~15 tok/s, near-original quality
- F16: 5.0 GB, ~8 tok/s, full precision

Recommendation: Q4_K_M for mobile, Q5_K_M for desktop with >=8GB RAM.

title: GoRouter Nested Navigation Pattern
content:
For shell routes with persistent bottom nav:

```dart
GoRouter(
  routes: [
    StatefulShellRoute.indexedStack(
      builder: (context, state, child) => AppShell(child: child),
      branches: [
        StatefulShellBranch(routes: [GoRoute(path: '/chat', ...)]),
        StatefulShellBranch(routes: [GoRoute(path: '/brain', ...)]),
        StatefulShellBranch(routes: [GoRoute(path: '/apps', ...)]),
        StatefulShellBranch(routes: [GoRoute(path: '/settings', ...)]),
      ],
    ),
  ],
)
```

Each branch preserves its own navigation stack.

title: Weekly Workout Split
content:
Current program (Push/Pull/Legs, 6 days):

Mon - Push: Bench 4x8, OHP 3x10, Incline DB 3x12, Lateral Raise 4x15, Tricep Pushdown 3x12
Tue - Pull: Deadlift 3x5, Barbell Row 4x8, Pull-ups 3xF, Face Pull 4x15, Bicep Curl 3x12
Wed - Legs: Squat 4x8, RDL 3x10, Leg Press 3x12, Leg Curl 3x12, Calf Raise 4x15
Thu - Push (volume)
Fri - Pull (volume)
Sat - Legs (volume)
Sun - Rest + Mobility

title: Portfolio Design System Tokens
content:
Color palette:

- Surface: #1E293B (Slate 800)
- Text: #F8FAFC (Slate 50)
- Muted: #94A3B8 (Slate 400)

Typography: Inter for body, JetBrains Mono for code.
Spacing scale: 4px base (4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64).
Border radius: 8px default, 12px cards, 16px modals.

title: LLM Context Window Strategies
content:
When dealing with limited context windows:

1. Sliding window: Keep last N tokens, drop oldest. Simple but loses long-term context.
2. Summary buffer: Periodically summarize older messages into a condensed form.
3. RAG: Index conversation history, retrieve relevant chunks per query.
4. Hierarchical: Maintain topic summaries + full recent messages.

For Prism: Use hybrid approach (2 + 3). Summarize after 20 messages, use vector search for retrieval. Store full history in Drift DB regardless.
